Adherence.lore: Adherence to the laws of good is important- it’s why one fights the spread of corruption, after all. Though whether to follow the spirit or the letter… perhaps they too can be bent to your will.
Adherence.name: Adherence

Millennium.lore: Cosmic energy permeates this deceptively dull-looking chestplate, having been crafted with stardust from a comet that only passes over Wynn every 1000 years.
Millennium.name: Millennium

Ragni's Mail.lore: One of the few remaining standard issue mails that were used against the first hordes to emerge from the infamous portal over 1000 years ago.
Ragni's Mail.name: Ragni's Mail

Marius' Prison.lore: "I know the Beast may return one day...but these chains shall bind it for eternity." The inscription glows bright in the darkness.
Marius' Prison.name: Marius' Prison

Erratio.lore: The blind prophet who crafted this macabre breastplate used the bones of only the most ruthless justiciars and executioners. Its wearers are supposedly destined to only die either a heroic or a just death.
Erratio.name: Erratio

Sweeping Majesty.lore: Echoes of the Fracturing persist in the Sky at scales unimaginable, implying a power so all-encompassing it leaves you in awe.
Sweeping Majesty.name: Sweeping Majesty

Phantasmal Hostage.lore: A soul sacrificed willingly, to an eternity in captivity. Imprints and memories; all that remain of a hero of the lands.
Phantasmal Hostage.name: Phantasmal Hostage

Time Rift.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] You only have limited time. But what if, you could experience that time again? And again, and again...

majorIds.Sorcery: +Sorcery: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost.

Time Rift.name: Time Rift

Giant's Bracer.lore: This ill-fitting, bulky chestplate was never intended to be a chestplate at all. Rather, it is a broken fragment of an arm bracer, from the time of giants.
Giant's Bracer.name: Giant's Bracer

Discoverer.lore: Wealth and riches...but at what cost?
Discoverer.name: Discoverer

Cage of Bones.lore: The ancient bones of the demon Garaheth are stronger than steel. They clamp down when worn to constrict the bearer, inciting a slow madness.
Cage of Bones.name: Cage of Bones

Pristine Antiquity.lore: Smooth yet unassuming, this hollowed piece feels as if it lay untouched for millennia as the chaos that formed eastern Gavel unfolded around it. No blemish nor order, just nature preserved in its most perfect form.

majorIds.Divine Honor: +Divine Honor: Increases the bonus from Radiance by 10%. Bash deals î€-15% per hit.

Pristine Antiquity.name: Pristine Antiquity

Dead Samurai's Plate.lore: "We get a lot of weirdos coming from Gavel by airship. That plate mail looked unusably ornate!" -Calo, Private Airship Operator
Dead Samurai's Plate.name: Dead Samurai's Plate

Anima-Infused Cuirass.lore: Infused with the classical magicks of fire, water, and thunder, this ornately-crafted chestplate is given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.
Anima-Infused Cuirass.name: Anima-Infused Cuirass

Purple Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "ICY you looking at my fancy duds" knitted onto the front.
Purple Wynnter Sweater.name: Purple Wynnter Sweater

Arakadicus' Body.lore: Long strips of chitin discarded from the mother of spiders Arakadicus still contain traces of her wicked powers, but few have survived the attempts to harvest them.
Arakadicus' Body.name: Arakadicus' Body

Aquarius.lore: “The symbol of the river” is a name that is often synonymous with this garment, with many water like qualities surrounding it, heavily bathed in magical meaning.
Aquarius.name: Aquarius

Gadgeteer.lore: This suit was clearly designed by the hand of a mechanic, though its purpose is unknown. There are quite a lot of buttons on it though, so let’s press this one!
Gadgeteer.name: Gadgeteer

Insignia.lore: To wear the mark is more than a show of allegiance. It is a willingness to channel the might of the gods at whatever cost, as the fate of the battle is worth more than surviving to see its end.

majorIds.Superconductor: +Superconductor: Chain Lightning channels three massive lightning bolts through you, arcing to enemies within 8 blocks for î€ƒ225% and stunning them for 1s. You take 15% more damage for 4s.

Insignia.name: Insignia

Katoa's Warmth.lore: Brilliantly golden as the crops from the humble farm, its mere presence fills stomachs and brings comfort, but only to those who are modest and generous.
Katoa's Warmth.name: Katoa's Warmth

Cannonade.lore: An impenetrable fortress’ greatest strength is psychological, a mythos built on the backs of a thousand attackers it has withstood. Your greatest strength is the belief that not one of those thousand could hold a candle to you.
Cannonade.name: Cannonade

requirements.quest: Realm of Light III - A Headless History

Indigo Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "GRAUPELING with a second helping of Craftmas feast" knitted onto the front.
Indigo Wynnter Sweater.name: Indigo Wynnter Sweater

Web Plate.lore: "I just need a little more spider silk to finish this vest!" -Lacrona, Detlas Tailor, found eaten by Nivla spiders
Web Plate.name: Web Plate

Isostatic Rebound.lore:
Death is naught but an inconvenience for the strongest of the corrupted. With time, the weight of destruction will pass, and the fires of War will rise anew from within.
It's pulling towards something.
Isostatic Rebound.name: Isostatic Rebound

White Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "SNOW way Craftmas can be bad in this sweater" knitted onto the front.
White Wynnter Sweater.name: White Wynnter Sweater

Yellow Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "YELLOW- How's your Craftmas going" knitted onto the front.
Yellow Wynnter Sweater.name: Yellow Wynnter Sweater

Gravity.lore: No one knows how this extremely dense chestplate can even logically exist. It is almost paradoxical in nature, and affects its wearers in unfathomable ways.

majorIds.Magnet: +Magnet: Pulls items dropped by mobs towards you.

Gravity.name: Gravity

majorIds.Strings of Fate: +Strings of Fate: Your puppets have a lifetime of 3 seconds and deal double damage with attacks and explosions.

Leo.lore: This thick skinned jacket, imbued with the courage of a thousand lion hearts, will grant the user massive protection from all who target them.
Leo.name: Leo

Twilight-Gilded Cloak.lore: An ephemeral moment in time captured by sheer force of magic, this ornately-crafted cloak is given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.
Twilight-Gilded Cloak.name: Twilight-Gilded Cloak

majorIds.Sorcery: +Sorcery: 30% chance for spells and attacks to cast a second time at no additional cost.

majorIds.Divine Honor: +Divine Honor: Increases the bonus from Radiance by 10%. Bash deals î€-15% per hit.

Garoth's Hope.lore: "Strangest thing, it turns out Creepers are incredibly flammable..." -Garull, Cryptid Researcher
Garoth's Hope.name: Garoth's Hope

Scarlet Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Why be merry? CLAUS I said so" knitted onto the front.
Scarlet Wynnter Sweater.name: Scarlet Wynnter Sweater

Orange Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "ORANGE you glad I showed up for Craftmas" knitted onto the front.
Orange Wynnter Sweater.name: Orange Wynnter Sweater

Dondasch.lore: The sheer bond between Adamastor and Urdar has manifested itself into a physical form due to their duress. Such power is not to be abused...
Dondasch.name: Dondasch

Enhanced Zeal.lore: Supposedly this chestplate belonged to a legendary paladin. The merchant has no explanation for why there are dozens of them.
Enhanced Zeal.name: Enhanced Zeal

Adamantite.lore: Adamantite is a soft metal often added to exotic medicine to increase one's health, but a revolutionary blacksmith on Black Road, created a chestplate with an Adamantite alloy, which is advertised to bolster the users endurance.
Adamantite.name: Adamantite

Firebird.lore: From the ashes, let a hero rise anew.

majorIds.Phoenix-Born: +Phoenix-Born: Health Regeneration is increased by 1% for every 1% Health missing.

Firebird.name: Firebird

Brown Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "YULE see me smiling this season" knitted onto the front.
Brown Wynnter Sweater.name: Brown Wynnter Sweater

Nemract's Ruin.lore: This chestplate was originally created as a memorial ornament to the lost lives of Ancient Nemract before being reforged into a powerful piece of armor for Nemract's guard.
Nemract's Ruin.name: Nemract's Ruin

Green Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "I'm feeling PINE, what about you" knitted onto the front.
Green Wynnter Sweater.name: Green Wynnter Sweater

Mummy's Rag.lore: The accursed mummy once wore this robe as a great pharaoh of the desert. It has long since rotted, leaving only a cursed shell of its former greatness.
Mummy's Rag.name: Mummy's Rag

Bob's Battle Chestplate.lore: This battered chestplate was once worn by the legendary Wynnic protector, Bob, during the fearsome corrupted sieges before he gave it away to an old friend. An air of melancholy hangs over it.
Bob's Battle Chestplate.name: Bob's Battle Chestplate

Andesite Aegis.lore: Andesite is a stone commonly used for weapons and construction, but tends to be ineffective as armor when impure. This sturdy chestplate, however, is testament to the strength of pure andesite.
Andesite Aegis.name: Andesite Aegis

Cinfras Souvenir T-Shirt.lore: The shirt has the quote "I went to the Letvus Airbase in Cinfras and all I got was this lousy T-shirt" printed on it.
Cinfras Souvenir T-Shirt.name: Cinfras Souvenir T-Shirt

Black Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Prepare for a FLURRY of Craftmas spirit" knitted onto the front.
Black Wynnter Sweater.name: Black Wynnter Sweater

Abdomen.lore: "...But under no circumstances should you stand directly behind an attacking spider. While not a universal trait, some spiders are capable of ejecting webs from their spinneret, leaving assailants and victims helpless." -Admiral Aegis' Guide To Nivla Threats, Chapter 3
Abdomen.name: Abdomen

Coeur Brise.lore: Left to brittle introspection, love unrequited stings the most when it brings down something built to last.
Coeur Brise.name: Coeur Brise

Red Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "I'll never give you the COLD SHOULDER" knitted onto the front.
Red Wynnter Sweater.name: Red Wynnter Sweater

Abiogenesis.lore: Life itself is not a flexible material to work with—building sentience is precisely like squeezing blood from a stone. It may be years of toil, but the strength of an entire race that looks to you as a creator cannot be overstated.
Abiogenesis.name: Abiogenesis

Elysium-Engraved Aegis.lore: Dedicated to a place of courage revered by all warriors, this ornately-crafted chestplate is given only to those who have bested the Mistress of the Hive.
Elysium-Engraved Aegis.name: Elysium-Engraved Aegis

Booster Plate.lore: A marvel of Corkus' electromagical advancements, this high-tech chestplate is equipped with steam jets to boost the user's speed, at a minimal cost to protection.
Booster Plate.name: Booster Plate

majorIds.Alter Ego: +Alter Ego: Awakened can be activated after saving 40% less mana, but its duration is reduced by 25%.

Phantasmal Remnants.lore: Memories take on lives of their own, left long enough.
Phantasmal Remnants.name: Phantasmal Remnants

Springtrap.lore: "After nearly getting trapped in an iron maiden, I figure I can study  those mummies just as well from home." -Achper, Almuj Archaeologist
Springtrap.name: Springtrap

Pink Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Going HAM on Craftmas dinner tonight" knitted onto the front.
Pink Wynnter Sweater.name: Pink Wynnter Sweater

Pine Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Let me NICK a few extra cookies for Craftmas" knitted onto the front.
Pine Wynnter Sweater.name: Pine Wynnter Sweater

The Jingling Jester.lore: Jingle jangle, while shaking your bells. Jingle jangle come the pockets of cash... Catch the trickster, send them to hell," their money is gone and off you've dashed!

majorIds.Greed: +Greed: Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 8% max health.

The Jingling Jester.name: The Jingling Jester

majorIds.Soul Eater: +Soul Eater: Devour and Harvester grant double mana. Decreases maximum marks by 1.

Taurus.lore: The hide of the Touroto, an almost invincible Bull-like creature, is said to be pierced only by the horn of the Touroto itself, making it extremely valuable.
Taurus.name: Taurus

Granitic Mettle.lore: Sometimes it takes a heart of stone to do what must be done.

majorIds.Rock Shield: +Rock Shield: Arrow Shield's defense is increased by 10%, but its number of charges is reduced by 1.

Granitic Mettle.name: Granitic Mettle

Beige Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "All STOCKINGED up for the season" knitted onto the front.
Beige Wynnter Sweater.name: Beige Wynnter Sweater

Quilted Carapace.lore: This patchwork of shells from the Corkian Astrochelys makes for quite the statement sweater; it keeps your neck warm and besides, your foes' fashion fancies feel frivolous, anyway.

majorIds.Transcendence: +Transcendence: 30% chance for spells to cost no mana when casted.

Quilted Carapace.name: Quilted Carapace

majorIds.Meteor Crash: +Meteor Crash: Burning Sigil deals î€…+15%, î€‚+10%, and gains +6 radius, but lasts half as long.

Enhanced Icarus.lore: Apparently, gluing some feathers on top of the decorative armor wings is supposed to allow you to fly- so says the merchant, at least.
Enhanced Icarus.name: Enhanced Icarus

Blessed Wrappings.lore: The thick, Bovemist-sanctified cloth is worn by their priests during certain religious ceremonies. It clears the mind and purifies the body.
Blessed Wrappings.name: Blessed Wrappings

Enhanced Copper Plate.lore: The merchant insists that the wear and oxidation on the armor "is a feature."
Enhanced Copper Plate.name: Enhanced Copper Plate

Angel Wing Shroud.lore: Out of respect and care for the dead, bovemists cloak them in blessed shrouds to aid their spirits in passing. These efforts, however, are not respected by the dead.
Angel Wing Shroud.name: Angel Wing Shroud

Sawdust.lore: Once cursed by a druid who had his grove chopped away by a greedy Villager, it was then purified and mass-produced for sale as armor, to the druid's utter disappointment.
Sawdust.name: Sawdust

Tisaun's Valor.lore: Tisaun, a warrior tasked to fend off a corrupted siege alone, could find only a thin shirt and rusted spear to use before the attack. He defeated all 1000 enemies without taking a scratch, and his bravery infused his gear with that same strength.
Tisaun's Valor.name: Tisaun's Valor

Libra.lore: Before the invention of magical weight detectors, there was a giant pair of public scales in Cinfras. Instead of being thrown away, they were reforged to be a formidable piece of armour.
Libra.name: Libra

Cardiac Arrest.lore: ...As the heart fails, adrenaline pumps through the body in an attempt to provide energy and keep the victim alive, but medical action must be taken to ensure survival. -Excerpt from Aldorei Medical Tomes, Vol. 6
Cardiac Arrest.name: Cardiac Arrest

Soul Ink.lore: Taken from the Archwraith by a pious Shaman, this chestplate was immediately abandoned. Its few users since have turned to an all-consuming desire to seek out and realign the last vestiges of purity remaining in the Kander Forest.
Soul Ink.name: Soul Ink

Sanguine Spaulder.lore:
Blood, gore, and bone fragments have congealed to your shoulder with the power of sheer corruption. The longer the mass is attached to you, the more of you it takes when you try to remove it.
It's pulling towards something.
Sanguine Spaulder.name: Sanguine Spaulder

Ribcage.lore: "...as intimidating as the name sounds, you want your organs to be trapped in this kind of cage." -Excerpt from Human Anatomy For Fools, Cirh Nettan
Ribcage.name: Ribcage

Guard's Garment.lore:
The previous owner seems to have met an untimely fate in the undead hordes outside Ragni. Stained but salvageable... a little corruption never hurt anybody, yet....
It's pulling towards something.
Guard's Garment.name: Guard's Garment

majorIds.Saviour\u2019s Sacrifice: +Saviour’s Sacrifice: While under 50% maximum health, nearby allies gain 15% bonus damage and defence.

majorIds.Lunge: +Lunge: Hop and Leap's horizontal velocity is greatly increased.

Wanderlust.lore: Are your heart, soul, and mind one? The ones who love are the most vulnerable. The ones who persist are the most detached. The ones who forget are the most naive. Only when you remove these impurities from your body could you reach the end.
Wanderlust.name: Wanderlust

Mutilated Corpse.lore:
Freshly slain foes in well below freezing conditions often provide enough warmth to weather the storm. However, this Corrupted seems to still be alive in some sickening way, draining life force to sustain itself.
It's pulling towards something.
Mutilated Corpse.name: Mutilated Corpse

Matryoshka Shell.lore: The armor worn by the enigmatic Matryoshka Idol. It appears to have a nearly uncountably high number of inlets and sockets set inside.
Matryoshka Shell.name: Matryoshka Shell

majorIds.Sublimation: +Sublimation: Totemic Shatter heals 75% of Regeneration's usual amount at the cost of 2 blocks of radius.

Cerulean Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "SLOPE to SKI you again next Craftmas" knitted onto the front.
Cerulean Wynnter Sweater.name: Cerulean Wynnter Sweater

Etiolation.lore: Despite the absence of natural light, in the deepest reaches of the Void grows foliage and flora capable of sustaining itself by absorbing latent energy. Such an accomplishment is to be admired, ideally from a keen distance.
Etiolation.name: Etiolation

majorIds.Plague: +Plague: Poisoned mobs spread their poison to nearby mobs.

Hetusol.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] The make of this massive cloak is unlike anything seen before among the provinces. Foreign images shift and melt in ethereal projections within the inside.
Hetusol.name: Hetusol

Enhanced Phosphene.lore: The paintjob on the armor is incredibly garish. Who thinks to combine sea green, mud, hot pink, and neon yellow?
Enhanced Phosphene.name: Enhanced Phosphene

Blue Wynnter Sweater.lore: The sweater has the quote "Don't feel BLUE- It's Craftmas!" knitted onto the front.
Blue Wynnter Sweater.name: Blue Wynnter Sweater

Molten Fleshmass.lore:
The scorching heat, the shifting bodies, the screeching cries of anguish... they're all the least of your problems now.
It's pulling towards something.

majorIds.Temblor: +Temblor: Bash gains +1 Area of Effect and is 25% faster.

Molten Fleshmass.name: Molten Fleshmass

Chimaera.lore: The one true Chimera in existence is sought by many, for great stories are told of its gifts to the worthy. One such gift was a simple fur coat, which gave the wearer but a taste of its power.
Chimaera.name: Chimaera

majorIds.Mangle: +Mangle: Lacerate will deal +1 slash.

Disfigured Vessel.lore: An imperfect fit, but you can make a better one.
Disfigured Vessel.name: Disfigured Vessel
